pages.text: Banish the darkness. The Ritual of Sol automatically places light sources in dark areas, preventing mob spawns and illuminating your surroundings. Place light-emitting blocks in a chest above the ritual.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: The ritual requires a chest (or any block with item storage) placed directly above the Master Ritual Stone. Every 5 ticks, the ritual attempts to:$(br)1. Find a valid block item from the chest$(br)2. Search for a dark spot (light level < 8) with solid ground below$(br)3. Place the block$(br)4. Consume LP for the operation

pages.title: Search Algorithm
pages.text: The ritual uses a center-outward search to find placement spots:$(br)- Starts at the Master Ritual Stone$(br)- Expands in square rings: 0, 1, 2... blocks away$(br)- Searches each column vertically$(br)- Prioritizes placing near the center first$(br)- Processes up to 64 positions per tick$(br)- Resumes where it left off between ticks$(br2)This ensures efficient placement starting from the ritual center.

pages.title: Blood Light Synergy
pages.text: $(bold)Special Feature:$()$(br)If you place Blood Magic's $(item)Sigil of Blood Light$() in the chest, the ritual will place Blood Lights $(bold)without consuming the sigil$()!$(br2)This allows for infinite blood light placement using only LP.$(br2)$(italic)Let there be light!$()

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 1000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 1 LP per block placed$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 5 ticks$(br2)$(bold)Effect Range:$() 65x65x65 blocks (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Chest:$() 1 block above ritual$(br2)Requires dark spots (light level < 8) with solid ground below to place blocks.
